channel.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?

item.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:5, topic:414337”]Why are you trying to make it so you have to be greater than 2. When you just want you and your friend to wear it.

[quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=516296.msg3747009#msg3747009 date=1315767894]

		if ((itemName.contains("perfect") && this.c.playerName
				.equalsIgnoreCase("riipiin"))
				|| this.c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ichigo")) {
			this.c.sendMessage("This item can only be worn bhy Riipiin and Ichigo.");
			return;
		}

Will work
[/quote][/quote]
I know right.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Why are you trying to make it so you have to be greater than 2. When you just want you and your friend to wear it.

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:414337”] if ((itemName.contains("perfect") && this.c.playerName .equalsIgnoreCase("riipiin")) || this.c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ichigo")) { this.c.sendMessage("This item can only be worn bhy Riipiin and Ichigo."); return; }

Will work[/quote]

item.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

try this

if ((itemName.contains("perfect") || (itemName.contains("perfect ring")) && !(c.playerRights =< 3)))) { c.sendMessage(“This item can only be worn by Riipiin and Ichigo.”); return false; }

Read full topic

		if ((itemName.contains("perfect") && this.c.playerName
				.equalsIgnoreCase("riipiin"))

item.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Wow I’m not even thinking straight sorry. I thought it was a command for a second. Sry I haven’t been coding items in a while. Put this:

if ((itemName.contains("`perfect`") || (itemName.contains("`perfect` ring")) && !(c.playerRights =< 3)))) {
                                c.sendMessage("This item can only be worn by Riipiin and Ichigo.");
                                        return false;
                        }

The exclamation mark means not. So your telling it to do this: If the player rights are not 3 then say “This item can only be worn by Riipiin and Ichigo”.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Making `perfect` ring wearable to playerRights == 3?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I have it so it denies access to all playerRights but 3. The thing that is bugging me, is that the when I added in this code no one can wear any item… Dont know what to do really do from here? if ((itemName.contains("`perfect`") || (itemName.contains("`perfect` ring")) && (c.playerRights > 2) || (c.playerRights =< 4)))) { c.sendMessage("This item can only be worn by Riipiin and Ichigo."); return false; } Is what I have at the moment.

Read full topic
